articles.author: FRANCE 24, FRANCE 24
articles.title: 🔴 Live: Niger junta says will 'prosecute' President Bazoum for 'high treason' - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: Niger's military regime vowed late Sunday to prosecute ousted president Mohamed Bazoum for "high treason" and slammed West African leaders for imposing sanctions on the country. ECOWAS has approved the deployment of a "standby force to restore constitutional …
